file_content.text: Lord Wrath. Welcome.
Darth Nox. This is an unexpected pleasure.
Darth Imperius. Welcome back.
Darth Occlus. On behalf of the crew, welcome.
Hunter. If you or your crew require anything, just let me know.
Commander. Welcome back.
The Battlemaster of the Jedi Order? This is an honor!
Barsen'thor. I... I did say it right, didn't I? It's a pleasure to have you here.
Welcome, Major. If Havoc needs anything, it's yours.
Captain! I heard about that stunt you pulled... nice.
I heard he's been spotted! We're due to engage any minute now.
He's been "spotted"? Come on, you can't "spot" a ghost.
He's not a ghost!
Fine, whatever. I'm not holding my breath either way.
Just a couple of dust-ups, and nobody's been knifed--you lost the bet. Pay up!
The mission isn't over yet! I'm telling you, one of these Republic goons is going to pull a blade before all's said and done.
Not a chance. They want this job done just as bad as we do. And there's a lot more of us than them.
You want to believe all that, fine. I'm keeping my eyes open.
Don't go that way--blasted droids have the run of the place!
There's no where else to go! We must stand and fight.
She's right. Let's show these things what we're made of!
For the Empire!
For the Republic!
